section.para: This extension allows to specify some channel settings specific for commercial applications of DMR. For now, it only allow for specifying the encryption key for a digital channel.

example.programlisting: channels: - digital: id: ch1 name: Example channel # all the other channel settings commercial: encryptionKey: KEY_LABEL

section.para: The commercial channel extension is a mapping named commercial. It contains the settings for commercial features for that channel.
For now, there is only one attribute specifying the encryption key associated with the channel.
